data.comment: Goal! Brentford have got their heads in front thanks to a Ivan Toney strike.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Emiliano Marcondes is booked for the home team.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Jay Fulton with Matt Grimes. This is the first substitution made today by Steve Cooper.
Kasey Palmer is replacing Yan Dhanda for Swansea at Griffin Park.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a first substitution, with Sergi Canos replacing Saman Ghoddos.
In the minute 69, Viktor Gyokeres is replacing Jamal Lowe for the away team.
Thomas Frank is making the team's second substitution at Griffin Park with Vitaly Janelt replacing Emiliano Marcondes.
Henrik Dalsgaard (Brentford) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 77, Goal! Swansea go level at 1-1 through Andre Ayew in London.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a third substitution, with Marcus Forss replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
At Griffin Park, Marcus Forss has been yellow-carded for the home team.
